name: Pantsu Hunter: Back to the 90s
description: Share a heart-to-heart talk, watch a movie together, take a bath, remove a computer virus, help a girl in a tough spot and—if you're lucky—find the love of your life using the color and pattern of her panties. This game tells the story about a guy looking for love renovated in a nostalgic 80s and 90s anime style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 216 MB available space
